OnPlayerMove.Description: Called when a player quits the server

ShouldMove.Description: Sets whether the player should move or not

GetLastPosition.Description: Get the last position of the player before the movement

HasChangedBlock.Description: Returns whether the player has changed blocks or not

HasChangedOrientation.Description: Returns whether the player has changed their orientation or not

HasChangedPosition.Description: Returns whether the has changed their position or not

ExplicitHasChangedBlock.Description: Returns whether the player has explicitly changed blocks, ignoring world changes

ExplicitHasChangedPosition.Description: Returns whether the player has changed poisiton, igonring world changes
